careersContent.Heading: Careers
careersContent.Paragraph: We are always looking for people who are thinkers and doers. We welcome the technical brains ready to cross the job boundaries for tasks never done before and people who are willing to explore the world of new possibilities and opportunities.

overview.paragraph1: MYLY is looking for a dynamic, responsive and detail-oriented person for managing operations. This position is ideal for someone who has a keen sense of customer service, understands technology products and is willing to roll his/her sleeves and get hands dirty. You will be reporting directly to the CEO (also the co-founder of MYLY)!
overview.paragraph4: EDUCATION: Bachelor’s/Master’s degree holder from an accredited college/university

dutiesResponsibility.heading: Duties & Responsibilities
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph1: Ensuring customers are able to use the MYLY solution in a seamless manner
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph2: Ensuring all customer complaints, issues & queries are logged and responded under defined turn-around time
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph3: Ensuring all customer emails, phone-calls are well attended and responded satisfactorily
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph4: Coordinating with technology team to get resolution to customer queries
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph5: Coordinating with product team to plan for incorporation of customer requirements in product development roadmap
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph6: Planning and delivery of customer training
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph7: Complete responsibility of customer on-boarding, data upload and go-live
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph8: Manage the operations team ensuring team spirit, job satisfaction and growth for team members
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph9: Communicating new updates, features, modules to customers by email, WhatsApp, SMS etc.
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph10: MIS to management on operational metrics like TAT for response, on-boarding schedule etc.
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph11: Capacity planning for operation team as per projections from sales team
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph12: Contribute to making myly a customer-friendly product

knowledge.heading: Knowledge, Skills & Abilities
knowledge.paragraph1: Must be extremely detail oriented with strong attention to follow-through
knowledge.paragraph3: Communicate effectively in both written + verbal form
knowledge.paragraph5: Ability to manage multiple tasks + meet deadlines
knowledge.paragraph6: Proficient in managing large amounts of data + ability to interpret + extract meaningful insights
knowledge.paragraph9: PC proficiency + strong skills in MS Office Suite (Outlook, Word, PPT, Excel) essential; any kind of graphic design/planning experience would be an added advantage
knowledge.paragraph10: Must be able to focus for long periods of time at a computer screen given the nature of the digital business

overview.paragraph1: myly is looking for a dynamic, responsive and detail-oriented person to be a part of the operations team. This position is ideal for someone who has a keen sense of customer service, is willing ot understand technology products and is willing to roll his/her sleeves and get hands dirty. You will be reporting to Manager - Operations.
overview.paragraph4: EDUCATION: Bachelor’s/Master’s degree holder from an accredited college/university

dutiesResponsibility.heading: Duties & Responsibilities
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph1: Interacting with clients on calls on a regular basis & updating them about the product & its up-gradations
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph2: Timely follow up with clients on engagement/usage of the product
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph3: Being the first point of contact for clients & addressing any issues from them in the first place
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph4: Maintaining records of the work allocated to him/her on a regular basis
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph5: Ability to accomplish the targets assigned to him/her within the given timeline
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph6: Other responsibilities as assigned from time-to-time

knowledge.heading: Knowledge, Skills & Abilities
knowledge.paragraph1: Must have good Communication Skills & a sound desire to make outbound calls to clients.
knowledge.paragraph2: Must have basic knowledge of working on MS Excel, Emails and Phone etiquettes
knowledge.paragraph3: Must have pleasing personality to speak to
knowledge.paragraph4: Good listener, with problem solving attitude
knowledge.paragraph5: Must be able to work in defined time-lines
knowledge.paragraph6: Must possess a positive & learning attitude

overview.heading1: This MYLY internship program is ideal for someone who is interested in furthering his or her education and experience in the world of B2B Sales. This internship will provide an opportunity to handle various aspects of B2B communication, product positioning, negotiation strategies, deal-making and sales closures. It will also entail a detailed understanding of Software Product Sales, one of the most sought after skills in the Indian IT industry. You will be meeting owners/directors/principals of schools, reputed school chains & coaching class giants selling them world-class cloud-based solution.

dutiesResponsibility.heading: Duties & Responsibilities
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph1: Prospecting and identifying potential sales opportunities
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph2: Initiating contacts via digital medium for product presentation, discussions, needs assessment & customer fitment
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph3: Setting up & coordinating meetings with prospects
dutiesResponsibility.paragraph4: Visiting and meeting prospects for in-person discussion and sales closure; Senior MYLY members may accompany you for meetings

knowledge.paragraph4: Ability to accept NO as answer
knowledge.paragraph6: Ability to assess pain areas and needs of the prospect and mapping with MYLY offerings
knowledge.paragraph7: Own 2-wheeler for travel in the city of choice
